title: Pablo Trobbiani
text:
Pablo Marcelo Trobbiani Carnesella (born 28 December 1976) is an Argentine <a href="Association%20football">football</a> manager and former player who played as a <a href="centre%20midfielder">centre midfielder</a>.
Personal life.
He is the son of the Argentine coach <a href="Marcelo%20Trobbiani">Marcelo Trobbiani</a>.
